networks.name: Ethereum Mainnet
networks.description: Ethereum Mainnet is a decentralized platform that enables developers to build and deploy smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps). It operates on a proof-of-stake consensus mechanism, enhancing scalability and reducing energy consumption.

networks.name: BNB Smart Chain
networks.description: BNB Smart Chain is a blockchain network that supports smart contracts and is optimized for high-performance decentralized applications. It is built for rapid transactions and lower fees, making it a popular choice for DeFi projects.

networks.name: Arbitrum One
networks.description: Arbitrum One is a layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum, designed to improve transaction throughput and reduce costs. It leverages optimistic rollups to enhance the speed of dApps while maintaining security through the Ethereum mainnet.

networks.name: Base
networks.description: Base is a layer 2 blockchain built on Ethereum, focused on enabling developers to create fast and cost-effective dApps. It enhances user experience with low fees and instant transactions while benefiting from Ethereum's security.

networks.name: Avalanche
networks.description: Avalanche is a high-performance blockchain platform that supports customizable blockchains and dApps. It is known for its unique consensus mechanism, enabling near-instant finality and high throughput.

networks.name: Polygon
networks.description: Polygon is a multi-chain scaling solution for Ethereum that enhances dApp performance and reduces costs through various layer 2 solutions. It provides a framework for building and connecting Ethereum-compatible blockchains.

networks.name: Bitcoin
networks.description: Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency, designed for peer-to-peer transactions without intermediaries. It operates on a secure blockchain network and is widely recognized as the first cryptocurrency, valued as a store of wealth and medium of exchange.

networks.name: NEAR
networks.description: NEAR is a decentralized application platform designed for speed and usability. It features a unique consensus mechanism called Nightshade, allowing developers to build scalable dApps with low fees and high performance.

networks.name: NEAR Testnet
networks.description: NEAR Testnet provides a testing environment for developers to experiment and deploy dApps without incurring costs. It mimics the mainnet's functionalities to facilitate safe testing and development.

networks.name: Solana
networks.description: Solana is a high-performance blockchain platform designed for decentralized applications and crypto projects. It features a unique consensus mechanism called Proof of History, allowing for fast transaction speeds and low costs.

networks.name: Starknet
networks.description: Starknet is a layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that utilizes zk-rollups for improved scalability and privacy. It enables developers to build scalable dApps while benefiting from Ethereum's security.

networks.name: Starknet Testnet
networks.description: Starknet Testnet allows developers to test their dApps in a secure environment before launching on the mainnet. It supports zk-rollups, providing a realistic testing ground.

networks.name: SEI (EVM)
networks.description: SEI (EVM) is a decentralized blockchain optimized for decentralized finance (DeFi) applications. It offers high throughput and low transaction fees, making it ideal for developers focused on DeFi.

networks.name: Injective
networks.description: Injective is a layer 2 decentralized exchange protocol that provides high-speed trading and cross-chain functionality. It empowers users to create and trade any financial market.

networks.name: Injective Testnet
networks.description: Injective Testnet is the testing environment for the Injective protocol, allowing developers to experiment with trading functionalities and features before launching on the mainnet.

networks.name: Amoy Testnet
networks.description: Amoy Testnet provides a sandbox environment for developers to test dApps and smart contracts without incurring real costs. It simulates the mainnet features for safe development.

networks.name: Arbitrum Sepolia
networks.description: Arbitrum Sepolia is a test environment for developers building on the Arbitrum platform, allowing testing of dApps with reduced costs and fast transaction times.

networks.name: Arweave
networks.description: Arweave is a decentralized storage solution that allows users to store data permanently on the blockchain. It utilizes a unique proof of access mechanism to ensure data longevity.

networks.name: Chapel Testnet
networks.description: Chapel Testnet is the testing ground for the Chapel blockchain, enabling developers to deploy and test their projects in a secure environment.

networks.name: Chiado Consensus Layer
networks.description: Chiado Consensus Layer provides a secure environment for executing smart contracts and facilitating decentralized applications on the Chiado blockchain.

networks.name: Cosmos Hub
networks.description: Cosmos Hub is the central blockchain in the Cosmos ecosystem, facilitating interoperability between various blockchains. It utilizes a proof-of-stake consensus mechanism for enhanced security.

networks.name: EOS Mainnet
networks.description: EOS Mainnet is a decentralized platform designed for high-speed transactions and scalability. It supports the development of dApps with a focus on user-friendly experiences.

networks.name: Ethereum Consensus Layer
networks.description: Ethereum Consensus Layer provides the underlying security and functionality for Ethereum, supporting smart contracts and decentralized applications with a proof-of-stake mechanism.

networks.name: Gnosis Consensus Layer
networks.description: Gnosis Consensus Layer is designed to enhance the scalability and efficiency of the Gnosis blockchain, allowing developers to build and deploy secure dApps.

networks.name: Holesky Testnet
networks.description: Holesky Testnet serves as a testing environment for developers to experiment with the features of the Holesky blockchain without financial implications.

networks.name: Holesky Consensus Layer
networks.description: Holesky Consensus Layer provides a secure environment for executing smart contracts, enhancing the Holesky blockchain's capabilities.

networks.name: Jungle4 Testnet
networks.description: Jungle4 Testnet allows developers to deploy and test their dApps in a realistic environment, facilitating the development of new features and functionalities.

networks.name: Kylin Testnet
networks.description: Kylin Testnet is a testing platform for developers building on the Kylin blockchain, enabling safe experimentation with dApps and smart contracts.

networks.name: Mode
networks.description: Mode is a decentralized platform aimed at simplifying the process of building and deploying applications in the blockchain space, focusing on user-friendliness and accessibility.

networks.name: Optimism
networks.description: Optimism is a layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that enhances transaction speeds and reduces costs for dApps while maintaining security through the Ethereum mainnet.

networks.name: Osmosis
networks.description: Osmosis is a decentralized exchange platform designed for liquidity providers and traders, facilitating the swapping of tokens within the Cosmos ecosystem.

networks.name: Sepolia
networks.description: Sepolia is a testnet for Ethereum, allowing developers to test their applications and smart contracts before deploying them on the mainnet.

networks.name: Sepolia Consensus Layer
networks.description: Sepolia Consensus Layer provides a secure environment for executing smart contracts, supporting Ethereum dApps with a proof-of-stake mechanism.

networks.name: Telos
networks.description: Telos is a high-performance blockchain designed for dApps, offering fast transaction speeds and a user-friendly experience.

networks.name: Telos Testnet
networks.description: Telos Testnet is a safe environment for developers to test their dApps and features without incurring costs.

networks.name: Theta
networks.description: Theta is a decentralized video streaming platform that utilizes blockchain technology to improve content delivery and distribution.

networks.name: WAX
networks.description: WAX is a blockchain focused on the creation and trading of virtual goods and collectibles, facilitating a user-friendly environment for developers and gamers.

networks.name: WAX Testnet
networks.description: WAX Testnet allows developers to test their applications in a secure environment before deploying them on the WAX mainnet.
